dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.sales.compet.Competitor
dataStructure.description:
A Party playing a PartyRole that offers ProductOfferings similar to the enterprise's ProductOfferings in a MarketSegment.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: Competitor

child.name: iD
child.description:
A unique identifier for the Competitor.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: iD

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that further details the strength, weakness, opportunity, or threat for a Competitor in a MarketSegment.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: dateCreated
child.description:
The date on which interest was first shown for the Competitor.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: dateCreated

child.name: marketSegment
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CompetitorMarketSegment

This association end is optional
child.label: marketSegment

child.name: competitorSWOT
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CompetitorMarketSegmentSWOT

This association end is optional
child.label: competitorSWOT

This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is optional
child.label: competitorTier

child.name: partyRole
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PartyRoleOwnsCompetitor

This association end is optional
child.label: partyRole
